entities.name: halloween feast
entities.description: The Halloween feast is mentioned as a good event that Harry would like to attend.

entities.name: hogsmeade
entities.description: Hogsmeade is mentioned as a place where everyone else goes, but Harry is left behind.

entities.name: dean thomas
entities.description: Dean Thomas offers to forge Uncle Vernon's signature on the form for Harry.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as someone who knows that Harry hasn't had his form signed.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron suggests using the Invisibility Cloak to help Harry get to Hogsmeade, but Hermione shoots down the idea.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione reminds Ron that Dumbledore said dementors can see through the Invisibility Cloak.

entities.name: percy weasley
entities.description: Percy tries to comfort Harry by telling him that Hogsmeade isn't all it's cracked up to be.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone who told the group about dementors being able to see through the Invisibility Cloak.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon's signature needs to be forged for Harry to go to Hogsmeade.

entities.name: zokos joke shop
entities.description: Zonko's Joke Shop is mentioned as a place in Hogsmeade that is 'frankly dangerous'.

entities.name: shrieking shack
entities.description: The Shrieking Shack is mentioned as a place in Hogsmeade.

relationships.description: Harry wants to attend the Halloween feast, but is left behind.
Dean Thomas offers to forge Uncle Vernon's signature on the form for Harry.
Ron suggests using the Invisibility Cloak to help Harry get to Hogsmeade.
Hermione reminds Ron that Dumbledore said dementors can see through the Invisibility Cloak.
Percy tries to comfort Harry by telling him that Hogsmeade isn't all it's cracked up to be.
